title: Torq
description:
### Track all execution events posted from Torq workflows in one dashboard.

### Use tags on events to separate events by environments, services, and applications. Or, build out dashboards. 

###For full visibility into your Torq workflow runs, go to [the Torq app](https//app.torq.io).

definition.content:
### About Torq

[Torq](https://torq.io) is a no-code automation platform for security and operations teams

### Using this dashboard

In the dashboard, you can track Torq originated events though a timeline and event stream. These events are produced by the Datadog Post Event step in Torq workflows running in the [Torq App](https://app.torq.io). 

You can use these events to keep track of workflow runs, send back status updates, or share enriched data collected by your workflows back to Datadog.
